attributes.action: Put Blackpool into lockdown like rest of Lancashire
attributes.additional_details: Time to start protecting the residents first instead of making money for our council pocket as that's all the council thinks of not us residents. About time Blackpool put our health first not money during this covid-19 pandemic and lock Blackpool down
attributes.background: Put Blackpool into lockdown as there is more visitors here then middle of high season. Tourist are flooding into Blackpool as there areas are in lockdown and there is zero social distancing or masks being worn.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition, Blackpool has been included in new regulations.
